column2: subject=''[[The Return of the King]]'', publication

column1: The fragment of this letter to [[Allen and Unwin
column2: Allen & Unwin]] that [[Christopher Tolkien]] and [[Humphrey Carpenter]] chose to include consists of only two sentences: "When is [[The Return of the King
column3: Vol. III]] likely now to appear? I shall be murdered if something does not happen soon."

column1: * ''[[The Return of the King]]'' was published on [[20 October
